full_summary:
===============

Subject: Notice of Request for Proposal for Trijicon Night Sights Replacement
================================================================================

### Notice Details:

*   **Reference Number:** PW-__BM-042-29090
*   **Solicitation Number:** 21107-238425/A
*   **Publication Date:** June 9, 2023
*   **Closing Date:** July 27, 2023, at 14:00:00

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is inviting qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the replacement of Trijicon Night Sights. This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks to acquire the necessary equipment to support the Correctional Service of Canada.

### Notice Type and Procurement Category

This is a request for proposals under a competitive tendering process, with the contract award being based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
------------------------------------------

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Delivery

The procurement will be delivered in the following regions:
---------------------------------------------------

*   Quebec (except National Capital Region)
*   Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contact Information

Suppliers interested in participating in this procurement should contact the following official:

*   **Name:** Phillip, Scott
*   **Email:** scott.phillips@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** (819) 230-4362

### Attachments

The attached documents provide further information regarding this procurement:
------------------------------------------------sku


### Procurment Description

The Correctional Service of Canada requires the replacement of the Trijicon Night Sights. The selected supplier must provide one please see document "Specifications Documents".

Documents and details 
-------------------

The documents are available on the Canada Buys Website. You may submit your proposal in either English or French. The list of required document are specified in the tender document.
 MacOS and Linux users may also format the word document before transition.
